entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 80 gusting to 100 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending after midnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 4 cm near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 30 km/h except gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
